COVID-19 is caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus, which spreads primarily through respiratory droplets when an infected person coughs, sneezes, or talks. 5G is the fifth generation of mobile network technology, which uses non-ionizing radio waves to transmit data and is not capable of transmitting viruses or affecting the immune system in a way that would cause viral infections.
